module.name: product_view_definition_properties
module.name.french: Propriété de définition de vue de produit
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of assignments of properties to product view definitions and relationships.

inscope.li: assignment of properties to product view definitions;
assignment of properties to product view definition relationships.

uof.name: Product_View_Definition_Properties
uof.description: The product view definition properties UoF enables the assignment of properties to a Product_view_definition and relationships between them.

aa.refpath: property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition

property_definition property_definition.definition -> characterized_definition characterized_definition = characterized_product_definition characterized_product_definition = product_definition_relationship
